entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo` #90852
    Future
  • Fix source-gen issue with a binding member access expression being on a separate line from the member expression #90851
    8.0.0
  • Upgrade the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* version to use compiler interceptors for source gen #90849
    8.0.0
  • JIT test GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails in Checked NativeAOT #90848
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get the actual key from the Dictionary #90840
    Future
  • .NET runtime's method of loading Assemblies breaks Win32 LoadLibrary behavior #90839
  • Is there any way to remove DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader #90838
    9.0.0

Closed

  • create enough some daughtered enough some create.. #90853
  • High base memory usage with .NET 7 and 8 prev 7 #90843
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in config binder generator #89322
    8.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest_ResolutionFlow test fails #90593
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #90580
    8.0.0
  • CLR crashing when running RemoteExecutor tests locally on Debug builds #90485
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM AOT code is 1 to 1.5 orders of magnitude slower than native CLR #59816
    9.0.0
  • Using runtime built and dynamically-loaded dlls in Blazor Runtime causing issue in Kestrel hosting process. #76554
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] RuntimeTypeHandle.Equals seems to be broken in Release mode #90800
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #90844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Use symbol comparison in `CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer` #90850
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90811
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #90846
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix: function name typo #90845
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90835
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Events for IL methods without IL headers #90826
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90799
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90832
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90825
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90827
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Add Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet exec` and `dotnet run` fails to run if a dependency has a non default file extension #34775

Closed

  • dotnet-watch has a dependency on ASP runtime, despite being a CLI-only tool. #34777

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2247839 #34778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • I noticed a copy issue in another PR which may be related to the reference here that shouldn't be necessary. #34768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #69628
  • Collection expressions should use AddRange(ReadOnlySpan) when available and compatible to bulk add spread elements. #69626
  • Tracking issue to ensure collection spread expression are target typed properly. #69625
  • Tracking issue for collection expressions to support conversion to interfaces. #69623

Closed

  • -Spam- #69629
  • Missing implementation for inline arrays via collection expression #69236
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not wrap an existing collection that was on one line and is having no items added to it #69624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on fluent. #69621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on builders. #69620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on empty. #69619
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on initializer. #69618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on arrays. #69617
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add reproducer for is-pattern temp issue #69615
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache substituted base type #69605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mapaction #50207
  • RenderModeSSR #50206
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB3027 Could not copy "E:\15. Code Learning\Learning\Core.Application\bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll" to "bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll". Exceeded retry count of 10. Failed. The file is locked by: ".NET Host (4176)" Presentation.MVC d:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Preview\MSBuild\Current\Bin\amd64\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4879 #50200
  • StreamRendering displays additional tags when large data is processed #50198
  • Default Blazor template contains "uncrawlable links" causing SEO score loss on PageSpeed Insights #50196
  • Align Blazor WebAssembly template content with the Blazor Web App template #50195
    8.0-rc2

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50154
  • [Blazor] Template open questions #48342
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Local development build improvements #50205
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add Problem(ProblemDetails) to allow configuring ProblemDetails.Extensions property #50204
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove Visual Studio Extension development workload requirement from `.vsconfig` #50202
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve crawlability of links in default Blazor project templates #50197
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2247850 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Collectionview jitters / scrollskips on iPhone 14 simulators / devices (even in .NET 8) #16877
  • BlazorWebView - Mouse Events not being triggered in Android #16875
  • Cannot add Mica backdrop to Maui Blazor hybrid app #16874
  • Radio buttons work correctly with Windows, but they do not work at all with Android. #16873

Closed

  • .net 8 preview 4 HotRestart prevents launching iOS app #15564
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • A #16866
  • Windows Picker TextColor on PointerOver has no effect #16751
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into net8.0 #16876
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Correct minor Barometer API docs mistake #16853
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add note about ClipsToBounds/IsClippedToBounds #16833
    area/docs 📓
  • [windows] Fix Picker PointerOver TextColor (#16751) #16752
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker, Under Consideration

Updated

  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃
